English.Text: Ahh...the intemperance of addiction. Although they soon grow accustomed to the devilish hallucinations, your men now develop a profane appetite for the pleasures of the flower â€” slumber's holy balm. Procrastination, and apathy towards the supposedly 'materialistic objectives' of the expedition are the products of these indulgences. When finally dragged away from the sleepy waters, the crew weep bitterly, and swear to be idle for the remainder of their commission.
